  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4502</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Skriftgruppenes utvikling</string>
            <string language="en">The Historical development of text groups</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die historische Entwicklung der Textgruppen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le développement historique des groupes des 
textes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenvolvimento histórico de grupos do texto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sviluppo storico dei gruppi del testo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορική ανάπτυξη των ομάδων κειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El desarrollo histórico de los grupos del texto</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">En gjennomgang av typografiens utvikling fra middelalderen til vår tid, og hva som skiller de forskjellige skriftgruppene fra hverandre.</string>
            <string language="en">A presentation of the development of typography fro the middle ages until modern times. What is the distinction of the different groups?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">typografi</string>
            <string language="en">typography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">skriftgruppe</string>
            <string language="en">textgroup</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">skriftgrupper</string>
            <string language="en">textgroups</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Darstellung der Entwicklung von Typographie 
fro, welches die Mitte bis moderne Zeiten altert. Was ist die 
Unterscheidung der unterschiedlichen Gruppen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation du développement du fro de 
typographie que le milieu vieillit jusqu'aux temps modernes. 
Quelle est la distinction des différents groupes ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação do desenvolvimento do fro que 
do typography o meio envelhece até épocas modernas. Que é a 
distinção dos grupos diferentes?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione dello sviluppo del fro che di 
tipografia la metà invecchia fino ai periodi moderni. Che cosa 
è la distinzione dei gruppi differenti?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια παρουσίαση της ανάπτυξης του fro τυπογραφίας οι 
μέσες ηλικίες μέχρι τους σύγχρονους χρόνους. Ποια είναι η 
διάκριση των διαφορετικών ομάδων;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación del desarrollo del fro de la 
tipografía que el centro envejece hasta épocas modernas. 
¿Cuál es la distinción de los diversos grupos?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">textgroup</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">textgroups</string>
          </keyword>
